channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-10447] Beeline JDBC Driver to support 2 way SSL
item.description: This jira should cover 2-way SSL authentication between the JDBC Client and server which requires the driver to support it.
item.summary: Beeline JDBC Driver to support 2 way SSL

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: cc-ing thejas , vgumashta for review.

leftylev Here is the documentation : https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/HiveServer2+Clients#HiveServer2Clients-Using2-waySSLinHTTPMode
This issue has been fixed and released as part of the 1.2.0 release. If you find an issue which seems to be related to this one, please create a new jira and link this one with new jira.
Looks good, thanks hsubramaniyan! Removing the TODOC1.2 label.
